pageContext.claim: “Somebody please tell incompetent (thanks for my high poll numbers) & corrupt politician Adam 'Shifty' Schiff to stop leaking Classified information or, even worse, made up information, to the Fake News Media. Someday he will be caught, & that will be a very unpleasant experience!”
pageContext.analysis: Rep. Adam Schiff (D-Calif.) denied the president’s charges and neither Trump nor his surrogates provided evidence to support the president’s claim.
